title: Matiate
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe/bar/restaurant offers many vegan dishes, including falafel with pita bread, hummus or tahini; eggplant puree and salad; pizza (ask for no cheese); grilled onion rings and more. Chakchuka, a stew with vegetables without eggs is another vegan choice as is pasta and salads. For your sweet tooth, watermelon, sorbet or baklava for dessert.
